sect2.para: For further cards look at CARDS-Status (0.9.x-version) or the doc/CARDS file (older Version). Please send an email to l.x.@gmx.de about what you'd got on "cat /proc/pci | grep audio" and what driver you used. If that Appendix grows big enough, I'll use it for an automatic installation script.
